name: Bernard Arnault
pera: Bernard Jean Étienne Arnault is a French businessman, investor and art collector. He is the chairman and chief executive of LVMH Moët Hennessy

name: Jeff Bezos
pera: Jeffrey Preston Bezos is an American entrepreneur, media proprietor, investor, and computer engineer. He is the founder and executive chairman of Amazon

name: Elon Musk
pera: Elon Reeve Musk FRS is an entrepreneur and business magnate. He is the founder, CEO and Chief Engineer at SpaceX; early stage investor

name: Bill Gates
pera: William Henry Gates III is an American business magnate, software developer, investor, author, and philanthropist. He is a co-founder of Microsoft

name: Mark Zuckerberg
pera: Mark Elliot Zuckerberg is an American media magnate, internet entrepreneur, and philanthropist. He is known for co-founding Facebook, Inc

name: Larry Ellison
pera: Lawrence Joseph Ellison is an American businessman and investor who is the co-founder, executive chairman, chief technology officer

name: Larry Page
pera: Lawrence Edward Page is an American business magnate, computer scientist, and Internet entrepreneur

name: Sergey Brin
pera: Sergey Mikhaylovich Brin is an American business magnate, computer scientist and Internet entrepreneur. Together with Larry Page, he co-founded Google

name: Warren Buffett
pera: Warren Edward Buffett is an American business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He is currently the chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway

name: Françoise Bettencourt Meyers
pera: Françoise Bettencourt Meyers is a French billionaire heiress and the richest woman in the world

name: Steve Ballmer
pera: Steven Anthony Ballmer is an American businessman and investor who served as the chief executive officer of Microsoft from 2000 to 2014

name: Mukesh Ambani
pera: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani is an Indian billionaire businessman, and the chairman, managing director, and largest shareholder of Reliance Industries Ltd
